data.title: PRTG / paessler.com

data.text:
Updated 5 years ago

These steps will let you send PRTG SMS notifications via the ClickSend SMS gateway.

Open the PRTG web interface.

From the main menu bar, choose Setup | System Administration | Notification Delivery and navigate to section SMS Delivery.

Choose the option Enter a custom URL for a provider not listed for the setting Configuration Mode.

Enter the following Custom URL:

https://api-mapper.clicksend.com/http/v2/send.php?method=prtg&username=xxxx&key=xxxx&to=%SMSNUMBER&message=%SMSTEXT

replace xxxx in 'username=xxxx&key=xxxx' with your API username and API key - you can get this from your dashboard at: https://dashboard.clicksend.com/#/account/subaccount

Save your settings.

Contact us if you require any assistance with the setup.
